ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] new money making method near Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: I do not know about the other servers, but we are still going strong on the Innoruuk server (Avanguardia). Anyways, I encourage that you switch servers to one
ygData.messageBody:
I do not know about the other servers, but we are still going strong on the
Innoruuk server (Avanguardia). Anyways, I encourage that you switch servers
to one of the other servers Kaen mentioned since theres a larger singaporean
player base there. Just send a tell to Leshrec if you need help or anything
if you ever come to the Innoruuk server.

P.S. Theres are quite a few people in Silvermoon lan shop (Tiong Bahru
plaza) who plays everquest in our guild so feel free to drop in and meet
some of our members ;)

Leshrec Kalesk'Thor
Sorcerer aka HEY CABBY!

----- Original Message -----
From: Kaen <chaotic@...>
To: <sg-everquest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 3:44 AM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] new money making method near Freeport


> No Offence Kelvin but most of us here are lvl 50+ players
> and very bored people (most of which have NO life whatsoever) .
>
> If u want to find a server with lots of Singaporeans
> head down to Erollisi Marr , Lanys T''vyl or Innoruuk
>
>
> Kaen
> Erollisi Marr
>
> At 08:42 PM 3/16/2001, you wrote:
> >For those who are near freeport,
> >go to desert of ro through freeport.
> >there is an inn very near to the zone area that sells
> >large sewing kit.
> >
> >most of the other places selling this are far away
> >I have heard from other boards that each of this can sell 5pp-10pp
> >most people are lazy to find it or too low level to travel far.
> >
> >I am trying it at my server i hope this work :P
> >cheers
> >
> >happy questing
> >
> >kelvin
> >
> >
> >
> >Singapore Everquest Players List
> >

>
